Package controllers

Class CreateResupplyRequestController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AbstractController
controllers.CreateResupplyRequestController
public class CreateResupplyRequestController extends AbstractController
CreateResupplyRequestController class is a controller that interacts with the region manager's resupply request panel. It extends AbstractController and overrides methods of it.
